verses.roman:
pratyakṣe dekhaha nānā prakaṭa prabhāva
alaukika karma, alaukika anubhāva

synonyms: pratyakṣe—directly; dekhaha—just see; nānā—various; prakaṭa—manifested; prabhāva—influence; alaukika—uncommon; karma—activities; alaukika—uncommon; anubhāva—realizations in Kṛṣṇa consciousness.
translation: One can also directly see Lord Caitanya's manifest influence in His uncommon deeds and uncommon Kṛṣṇa conscious realization.
